content: American educator and vegan activistThis biography of a living person **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help by adding reliable sources. Contentious material about living persons that is unsourced or poorly sourced **must be removed immediately** from the article and its talk page, especially if potentially libelous. *Find sources:* "George Jacobs" educator – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(May 2022)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Dr. George Jacobs** (born 1952) is a well-known educator and [vegan](/wiki/Veganism) activist in Singapore. ## Early life - Born in the United States in 1952 - Jacobs went to [Metuchen High School](/wiki/Metuchen_High_School), [Metuchen](/wiki/Metuchen), New Jersey, United States ## Career - 1980: [Bachelor of Arts](/wiki/Bachelor_of_Arts), [University of Illinois at Chicago](/wiki/University_of_Illinois_at_Chicago), United States - 1982: Master of Arts, [University of Illinois at Chicago](/wiki/University_of_Illinois_at_Chicago), United States - 1991: [Doctor of Philosophy](/wiki/Doctor_of_Philosophy) (PhD), [University of Hawaiʻi](/wiki/University_of_Hawai%CA%BBi), United States - 2003–2013; 2015– President, [Vegetarian Society (Singapore)](/wiki/Vegetarian_Society_(Singapore)) - 1993–present: Teaching for [Southeast Asian Ministers of Education Organization](/wiki/Southeast_Asian_Ministers_of_Education_Organization), [Ministry of Education](/wiki/Ministry_of_Education_(Singapore)), [Center for American Education](/wiki/Center_for_American_Education_(disambiguation)), [James Cook University Singapore](/wiki/James_Cook_University_Singapore) ## Personal life - Became Vegetarian in 1980, in recent years, George has switched to a [vegan diet](/wiki/Veganism). - George is married with Dr. Fong Cheng Hong ### Books (selection) and Publications (selection) To date, George Jacobs has authored/co-authored the following books: *New Asian Traditions Vegetarian Cookbook*, [ISBN](/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)) 9812480560 by Amy, Susan; Kiran Narain & George Jacobs *The Heart Smart Oil Free Cookbook*, [ISBN](/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)) 978-9814342292 by Mayura Mohta & George Jacobs Jacobs, G.
